医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
AmoyDx®泛肺癌PCR Panel在日本获批作为海一坦®片剂（古马龙替尼）的伴随诊断Riken Genesis Co., Ltd.、Amoy Diagnostics Co., Ltd.和Precision Medicine Asia Co., Ltd.今天宣布日本厚生劳动省已批准AmoyDx®泛肺癌PCR试剂盒https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/AmoyDxc2ae-Pan-Lung-Cancer-PCR-Panel-approved-in-Japan-as-a-companion-diagnostic-for-Haiyitanc2ae-tablets-(gumarontinib ).aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/AmoyDxc2ae-Pan-Lung-Cancer-PCR-Panel-approved-in-Japan-as-a-companion-diagnostic-for-Haiyitanc2ae-tablets-(gumarontinib ).aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a232d63-bef6-431a-bfb0-3966dadb80a7 Fri, 23 Aug 2024 07:18:00 -0400 AmoyDx® Pan Lung Cancer PCR Panel approved in Japan as a companion diagnostic for Haiyitan® tablets (gumarontinib)
特朗普大幅夸大年度芬太尼死亡人数前总统唐纳德·特朗普在最近的一次竞选集会上声称，每年有超过 30 万美国人死于合成阿片类药物芬太尼，芬太尼过量服用的数量是他执政期间的“最低”，此后一直在猛增。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Trump-drastically-inflates-annual-fentanyl-death-numbers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Trump-drastically-inflates-annual-fentanyl-death-numbers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2257379-0c57-408b-b781-f0a11a092e07 Fri, 23 Aug 2024 06:40:03 -0400 Trump drastically inflates annual fentanyl death numbers
残疾人权利活动人士敦促政府让他参与社会加勒特·弗雷拒绝缺阵。弗雷一生 42 年，有 37 年以上颈部以下瘫痪。几十年来，当他和其他残疾人无法获得在家中生活和参与社会所需的支持时，他一直拒绝接受政府的借口。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Disability-rights-activist-pushes-government-to-let-him-participate-in-society.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Disability-rights-activist-pushes-government-to-let-him-participate-in-society.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=81fc1d59-8c26-4c73-8ec0-2f2412d7614f Fri, 23 Aug 2024 06:34:49 -0400 Disability rights activist pushes government to let him participate in society
Cytek® Biosciences 利用新的智能算法实现面板设计自动化借助 SpectroPanel 工具，Cytek Cloud 改变了流式细胞仪面板设计，实现快速优化并增强科学家的研究能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Cytekc2ae-Biosciences-automates-panel-design-with-new-intelligent-algorithm.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Cytekc2ae-Biosciences-automates-panel-design-with-new-intelligent-algorithm.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1e430302-6f7e-4cc7-ae3d-a5f661529610 Fri, 23 Aug 2024 06:04:00 -0400 Cytek® Biosciences automates panel design with new intelligent algorithm
母体肠道细菌与胎儿大脑代谢的变化有关怀孕期间母体肠道中短双歧杆菌的存在对胎儿大脑代谢的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Maternal-gut-bacteria-linked-to-changes-in-fetal-brain-metabolism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Maternal-gut-bacteria-linked-to-changes-in-fetal-brain-metabolism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68a82fa6-1cd7-4f85-99d2-86bcc4434ffb Fri, 23 Aug 2024 05:54:00 -0400 Maternal gut bacteria linked to changes in fetal brain metabolism
认知行为疗法可提高癌症患者的心理健康和生活质量认知行为治疗对癌症患者心理健康和生活质量的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Cognitive-behavioral-therapy-enhances-the-mental-well-being-and-life-quality-of-cancer-患者.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Cognitive-behavioral-therapy-enhances-the-mental-well-being-and-life-quality-of-cancer-患者.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ffba6b9e-e07c-42b9-bbe6-33d13a463dc9 Fri, 23 Aug 2024 05:38:00 -0400 Cognitive behavioral therapy enhances the mental well-being and life quality of cancer patients
Risankizumab 在治疗中重度克罗恩病方面优于 ustekinumab研究人员比较了 risakizumab 和 ustekinumab 治疗中重度克罗恩病的疗效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Risankizumab-outperforms-ustekinumab-in-treatment-moderate-to-severe-Crohne28099s-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Risankizumab-outperforms-ustekinumab-in-treating-moderate-to-severe-Crohne28099s-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40ca99cd-3332-4726-9859-62629f904e71 Fri, 23 Aug 2024 04:31:00 -0400 Risankizumab outperforms ustekinumab in treating moderate-to-severe Crohn’s disease
母亲吸烟会增加新生儿严重发病的风险，即使是低强度吸烟研究人员探讨了严重的新生儿发病率与母亲在怀孕前或怀孕期间吸烟之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Maternal-smoking-increases-risk-of-severe-neonatal-morbidity-even-at-low-intensity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Maternal-smoking-increases-risk-of-severe-neonatal-morbidity-even-at-low-intensity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=431f9c0e-4dd3-4a1e-a213-d72ca3c86562 Fri, 23 Aug 2024 04:23:00 -0400 Maternal smoking increases risk of severe neonatal morbidity, even at low intensity
多模式治疗显示出癌症治疗的希望由于其复杂性和转移倾向（扩散或侵入身体附近组织或远处形成新肿瘤），癌症仍然是最具挑战性的疾病之一。化疗和放疗等传统疗法通常面临非特异性靶向和严重副作用等限制。作为回应，研究人员正在转向结合多种治疗方式的创新方法来解决这些问题。本研究探索了一种涉及 CNH 的尖端解决方案，以创建集光热疗法 (PTT)、免疫疗法和化疗于一体的多模式癌症光治疗平台。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Multimodal-therapy-shows-promise-for-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/Multimodal-therapy-shows-promise-for-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7c50a14b-6b7e-4bb4-9eef-78d2bdb4fba8 Fri, 23 Aug 2024 04:20:11 -0400 Multimodal therapy shows promise for cancer treatment
识别癌细胞靶标的新分析方法免疫系统识别的癌细胞有哪些特征？了解免疫细胞的潜在靶结构是开发个性化癌症免疫疗法的基本先决条件。德国癌症研究中心 (DKFZ) 和 NCT 海德堡的科学家正在发表一种基于质谱的高度灵敏的方法来识别此类肿瘤特异性“新表位”。该分析方法旨在检测这些低丰度蛋白质片段，并且需要最少量的样品材料。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/New-analytical-method-for-identifying-cancer-cell-targets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240823/New-analytical-method-for-identifying-cancer-cell-targets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b10d238c-e7cf-4dfd-895a-d6e871debe25 Fri, 23 Aug 2024 04:18:48 -0400 New analytical method for identifying cancer cell targets
